attributes.action: Ealing Council to end harassment & vigils outside Marie Stopes Clinic
attributes.additional_details:
Below are websites of the two anti-choice groups who hold vigils at the clinic. As you will see, their websites have worryingly misleading information - information that they use in their materials to give to patients.

http://helpersuk.org/help-in-a-crisis-pregnancy/ 

http://www.goodcounselnet.co.uk

This petition has been started due to Sister Supporter, a group of local residents of all religions, races and genders who could no longer tolerate the situation on Mattock Lane.
attributes.background: Ealing's abortion clinic is targeted daily by anti-choice protestors holding vigils, standing at the entrance gates intimidating women & sharing medically inaccurate information. Council land is being religiously politicised, targeting vulnerable people accessing legal health care and it must stop.

rejection.details:
It appears that your petition is directed at Ealing Council rather than the Government. Ealing Council has its own petition site here:

http://ealing.cmis.uk.com/ealing/ePetitions.aspx

Also, you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
